title: Only Once Away My Son 4
content:

[[size 90%]]
[[=]]
//Year 2,500,555//
[[/=]]
[[/size]]

Talloran falls some more.

In some of the rare moments where Talloran regains conscience from passing out, doubt plagues the mind, and it all feels like too much.

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
...
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

Talloran remembered the last time they spoke with Draven. Not the contents; the contents of such discussions has long passed their mind. No, it was during a rare moment of Draven visiting Site-118 to deliver an SCP, that Talloran got to talk to their boyfriend. And it was... nice. His chest never felt more warm until that moment.

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[http://scp-wiki.net/only-once-away-my-son/offset/4 And then they crashed through.]
author: Decibelles
